bibl.title: Anchors off Alexandria's Eastern Harbour.
bibl.note: Catalogue of sunken anchors off the Eastern Harbour: A. Falt pierced stones [1-13]; - B. Stone stock [1]; - C. Pieces of lead [1-3]; - D. Ancient iron anchors [1-11]; - E. Modern iron anchors [1-18]; - F. Grapnel anchors [1-11]. - Anchors in the bay of Alexandria and the history of navigation.

bibl.title: Alexandria under the Mediterranean. Archaeological Studies in Memory of Honor Frost

bibl.seg: Jean-Yves Empereur & Georges Soukiassian, Anchors off Alexandria's Eastern Harbour.
